custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetEntrySet INNER JOIN AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry ON (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) WHERE (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classNameId = ?) AND [$SHARED_TO_CLASS_PKS_MAP]

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetEntrySet INNER JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) INNER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetTags ON (AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId = AssetEntry.entryId) INNER JOIN AssetTag ON (AssetTag.tagId = AssetEntries_AssetTags.tagId) INNER JOIN AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry ON (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) WHERE (AssetEntrySet.creatorClassNameId = ?) AND (AssetTag.name = ?) AND (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classNameId = ?) AND ( ([$SHARED_TO_CLASS_PKS_MAP]) OR (AssetEntrySet.privateAssetEntrySet = [$FALSE$]) )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM AssetEntrySet INNER JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) INNER JOIN AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry ON (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) LEFT JOIN AssetEntries_AssetTags ON (AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId = AssetEntry.entryId) LEFT JOIN AssetTag ON (AssetTag.tagId = AssetEntries_AssetTags.tagId) WHERE ( ( (AssetEntrySet.creatorClassNameId = ?) AND (AssetEntrySet.creatorClassPK = ?) ) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (AssetTag.name = ?) ) AND (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classNameId = ?) AND ( ([$SHARED_TO_CLASS_PKS_MAP]) OR (AssetEntrySet.privateAssetEntrySet = [$FALSE$]) )

SELECT DISTINCT {AssetEntrySet.*} FROM AssetEntrySet INNER JOIN AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry ON (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) WHERE (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classNameId = ?) AND [$SHARED_TO_CLASS_PKS_MAP] ORDER BY AssetEntrySet.modifiedTime DESC

SELECT DISTINCT {AssetEntrySet.*} FROM AssetEntrySet INNER JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) INNER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetTags ON (AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId = AssetEntry.entryId) INNER JOIN AssetTag ON (AssetTag.tagId = AssetEntries_AssetTags.tagId) INNER JOIN AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry ON (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) WHERE (AssetEntrySet.creatorClassNameId = ?) AND (AssetTag.name = ?) AND (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classNameId = ?) AND ( ([$SHARED_TO_CLASS_PKS_MAP]) OR (AssetEntrySet.privateAssetEntrySet = [$FALSE$]) ) ORDER BY AssetEntrySet.createTime DESC

SELECT DISTINCT {AssetEntrySet.*} FROM AssetEntrySet INNER JOIN AssetEntry ON (AssetEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) INNER JOIN AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry ON (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) LEFT JOIN AssetEntries_AssetTags ON (AssetEntries_AssetTags.entryId = AssetEntry.entryId) LEFT JOIN AssetTag ON (AssetTag.tagId = AssetEntries_AssetTags.tagId) WHERE ( ( (AssetEntrySet.creatorClassNameId = ?) AND (AssetEntrySet.creatorClassPK = ?) ) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (AssetTag.name = ?) ) AND (AssetSharing_AssetSharingEntry.classNameId = ?) AND ( ([$SHARED_TO_CLASS_PKS_MAP]) OR (AssetEntrySet.privateAssetEntrySet = [$FALSE$]) ) ORDER BY AssetEntrySet.createTime DESC
